Text: Work smart Be smart Have funDear FTcom user Click the following link to experience an interactive online learning tool from FT New York Institute of Finance sbctcgisid NYIF Online is the virtual classroom of the FT New York Institute of Finance To maintain your competitive edge and advance your career all you need is a modem a browser and a good sense of humor Learning with NYIF Online is that simple Our webbased courses feature expert faculty lively animations and interactive exercises to ensure that youre learning Plus the courses are available hours a day So whether youre at home at work or on a business trip with NYIF Online you always receive the most uptodate practical information and training NYIF Online All the financial expertise you need Twice the creativity Visit sbctcgisid to demo an actual NYIF Online program For more information please contact FT New York Institute of Finance Avenue of the Americas th Fl New York NY wwwnyifcomonline Yours sincerely FTcom To unsubscribe from this FTcom correspondence please reply to this message with the single word unsubscribe in the subject line Your name will then be removed from our mailing list
